params.data: The data to encrypt. In the case of delayed-reveal NFTs, this is the "revealed" state              base URI of the relevant batch of NFTs.
params.key: The key with which to encrypt data

encryptedBaseURI(uint256).details: Returns the encrypted base URI associated with the given identifier.

params.identifier: The ID for the batch of delayed-reveal NFTs to reveal.
params.key: The key with which the base URI for the relevant batch of NFTs was encrypted.

reveal(uint256,bytes).notice: Reveals a batch of delayed reveal NFTs.
